Name: Hot Toddy (brandy & lemon)
Ingredients: 10 ml Demerara/Muscovado/brown sugar syrup (2 sugar to 1 water)
Instructions: Select and pre-heat a Toddy glass .
Prepare garnish of coin-sized lemon zest twist.
POUR first 3 ingredients in warmed glass and stir.
TOP with boiling water while spoon still in glass and briefly stir.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Warms the cockles with brandy and a good dose of citrus.
History: The first published reference to a Toddy was in England in 1741. A Brandy Toddy features in Jerry Thomas' Bar-tenders Guide , published in 1862 .
Nutrition: One serving of Hot Toddy (brandy & lemon) contains 136 calories
